reviews.title: Good Value- Great Location

reviews.text: Just got back from Milan. Had a lovely time and the hotel was perfectly situated for our trip. Easy walking distance to one of the main parks. Perfect for the Dumo. It's just off the square so you don't have to worry about being hassled by a million people trying to sell you dodgy roses and horrible little braclets.
reviews.title: Great location, very clean, good comfort, great value

reviews.title: Good location
reviews.text: The hotel felt like a ghost town so if your looking for a lively hotel bar for a drink and food then forget it. If like us your looking for somewhere that's quiet, safe, clean in a good loaction and not to expensive then this is your hotel.
We turned the air con off as it wasn't that hot in the room but i can imagine that peak summer is different and the air con is fairly noisey.
reviews.title: Sleepless in Milan
On Duomo's Doorstep
reviews.text: We have just returned from a weekend away at the Grand Hotel Plaza. The staff could not be more helpful and friendly. They all spoke English. The hotel was very clean and was to 4 star standard. Our room did not have much of a view, but the location of the hotel is right in the city centre. The location of the hotel is only a few hundred yards away from the Cathedral, shopping areas, restaurants and underground trains which are easy to use and cost only one euro for a trip to another area of town. Next door is a bar which laid on snacks (hot and cold) throughout the evening. Don't be put off by the fact that the bar is called "Scottish Bar" as it was actually a decent place and was frequented by Milanese people rather than tourists. We had heard that Milan was expensive to eat out, however we found this to be untrue. A litre of house wine would cost 10 Euro and a pizza, approx 6-10 Euro depending upon toppings. We will definitely be returning and staying in this hotel. We stayed Friday - Sunday and so the rates were cheap. The hotel was quiet - but apparenty mid-week the prices are higher and the hotel busier due to buisness bookings.

reviews.title: Superb Location, Great hotel.
reviews.text: This hotel is really located only 150m from the Duomo on a quiet piazza. Don't be fooled by the facade of the hotel which looks a bit shabby. The inside is quite the opposite!!!. Spotless room which looked recently refurbished and friendly staff. We paid 99euro per night which was very good value for money.

reviews.title: excellent hotel
reviews.text: Only the buffet breakfast didn't look very special. But you're in Italy, so why would you want to have breakfast in your hotel anyway!
